plot: A Princess called Shadi ( Happiness ) never smiles, Father does everything to make her happy but does not work, The son of castle's chief goes on a journey to find Potion of Gala and make her happy.
title: Potion of Gala
plot_es: A Princess called Shadi ( Happiness ) never smiles, Father does everything to make her happy but does not work, The son of castle's chief goes on a journey to find Potion of Gala and make her happy.
plot_en: A Princess called Shadi ( Happiness ) never smiles, Father does everything to make her happy but does not work, The son of castle's chief goes on a journey to find Potion of Gala and make her happy.
